title: Cassidy wants to talk Christian Faith and Tipless Restauranting
description:
Cassidy is a friend of Christian https://youtu.be/7WwdHAFRB14 and wanted to talk about her faith and her work in tipless restaurant movement I knew nothing about. 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/tipless#/
